bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Protection Systems of Transmission-to-Generation Interconnections
IEEE Guide for Protection Systems of Transmission-to-Generation Interconnections

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide documents accepted protection practices for transmission-to-generation interconnections. It is intended to cover the protection system applications at the interconnections between transmission systems and generation facilities greater than 10 MVA. This guide does not cover distributed energy resources.
